attributes.action: hold a General Election before or during October 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the PM has no mandate from his country, given the economic standing, and given that the public have a growing lack of trust in parliament members. We petition the PM to hold an election in October 2009.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
